Name: Origin
About the game: Set in the year 2037, in a post apocalyptic world, 11 years after humanity has fallen and left forgotten. Discover what really happened, what happened to everyone and where did the machine come from. You the player take on the role of one of the last humans left on Earth, the Universe for all you know. The path in front of you seems clear, Evade or fight your way through mechanical enemies, make a friend or keep to yourself, betray or be betrayed. Help, plunder, steal or murder. Loose your humanity or remember who you where but above all do what you need to survive. And remember, not everyone is your enemy but not everyone is your ally. Shape your world and become. Who will you be..?
Meta Title: Origin: Nov 29, 2019, Carcosa and Full Overview
